meanings.definition: A liquid mixture of lime and water used for whitewashing walls.
meanings.sent1: The limewashes brightened the old walls.
meanings.sent2: The painter applied limewashes to the exterior of the house.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kids accidentally spilled limewashes all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The limewashes flowed smoothly, covering every imperfection on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh limewashes filled the room, signaling a new beginning.

meanings.definition: To cover or whiten with limewash.
meanings.sent1: She limewashes the fence every spring to keep it looking clean.
meanings.sent2: The workers limewash the building to give it a fresh appearance.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to limewash itself by rolling in the spilled paint.
meanings.sent4: His laughter limewashes the room, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush limewashes the canvas, creating a masterpiece.
